subagent_type.description: The type of specialized agent to use for this task

prompt.description: The task for the agent to perform

description.description: A short (3-5 word) description of the task

model.description: Optional model to use for this agent. If not specified, uses the recommended model for the subagent type.

resume.description: Optional agent ID to resume from. If provided, the agent will continue from the previous execution.
